commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: And... Cheers!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Gulp* Ahhh! That's delicious!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Chika, you sure know how to drink! Have another!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: You're both acting like old men.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: How do you even get so excited over some juice?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You should eat your fill, too! This is your welcome party, after all!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks. Don't mind if I do.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Aw, you're so formal. Meanwhile Chika-chi and Hanamaru and the others are being really laid back, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But Mari, you guys are all my seniors.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Don't worry about stuff like that. We don't pay attention to that stuff even within our own group.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you s-sure? Okay, I guess I'll relax.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Which flavor of potato chips do you want? Consommé or salted seaweed?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Why not both?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Let's open the dorayaki, zura! I brought three different flavors: strained and coarse red bean paste, and chestnut-filled!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Everyone! There are guests in other rooms, so please keep it down!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Fiiine.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, what's your school like?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: My school?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I have a question too! Are the girls who were in the contest all the members of the School Idol Club?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: What's the level of netherworld activity in Tokyo right now?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Are there really super delicious restaurants everywhere in Tokyo, zura?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Um, the Setsuna Yuki from the contest is the same, super popular school idol Setsuna Yuki, right?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Come on now, everyone! How do you expect so many questions to be answered at once?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I-It's fine.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, the school I go to, Nijigasaki, is in the Daiba district in Tokyo. They have a lot of extra classes you can take there.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Extra classes? That sounds so cool! What kind of classes do you take?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I take music classes. We study about music and learn its history, learn to play different instruments, and even compose songs.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Do you compose the songs for your club?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. My job is to write songs everyone can perform to be greater idols!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Such passion. The members of Nijigasaki High School Idol Club must be so alluring.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They are!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu is my old friend, and always stays positive and tries hard.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi is very competitive, but always honest and everyone loves her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku has experience performing in plays, so the range of her expressiveness is amazing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin is very mature and calm, always bringing everyone together.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai is always full of energy and brightens everyone up. Kanata always seems sleepy, but she watches over everyone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Emma's smile is so soothing, and although Rina doesn't show it, she's very in touch with her emotions.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And Setsuna is everyone's senior as a school idol, so we learn a lot from her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They're all so great, I think they're too good for me. I want to do everything I can to help them succeed.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Could it be...?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Seems like a serious rival has appeared!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rival?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hearing about such incredible people makes me want to meet them! I want to meet the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Words from someone with a real connection definitely have weight to them.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Here I thought you were a little demon hopeful, but you're really a threat to Yohane's majesty. So be it. You are sufficient to be our opponent! Come at us!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You made up the little demon stuff on your own, Yoshiko.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: It's a little late to explain all that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: W-We definitely don't deserve praise like that from Aqours yet!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What on earth do you mean? I saw the video of the show in Tokyo. Nijigasaki performed admirably. You're suited to perform at a national level.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It gave me the tingles! After we saw you, we were all talking about how we won't let you guys beat us.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Seriously? But you guys are so awesome! Your collab shows and other shows are all so perfect. It's captivating.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Not at all. We're still on our way to the top. I told you this at the school, but with each performance, we're looking for our own charm.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah. Like Dia was saying, we practice every day, thinking this will be the day we find our true shine.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (When I saw them on the collab stage, they were shining brighter than anything I've ever seen. It was like a whole different world.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It made me feel deep in my heart that μ's and Aqours were all out of this world.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (They aren't though. They're incredible, sure, but they're just like us, always aiming higher, trying their best.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Maybe it's because they continue to look for their own way to shine that made the collab live so great.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Um, please let me stay around!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Wh-Whoa! What's with you all of a sudden?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll help with whatever I can in the Summer Festival! So please, let me hang around everyone for a while!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: That's some crazy spirit. Seems reliable!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup! I want to search for our own ways to shine with all of you.
